Logging a message of this type is equivalent to calling the [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/os_log_debug] function. Use this level to capture information that may be useful during development or while troubleshooting a specific problem.

The system only captures debug-level messages in memory when you enable debug logging through a configuration change, and purges them in accordance with the configuration’s persistence setting.

# debug

**Type Property**

The debug log level.

## Declaration

```swift
static let debug: OSLogType
```

## Discussion

Logging a message of this type is equivalent to calling the [doc://com.apple.os/documentation/os/os_log_debug] function. Use this level to capture information that may be useful during development or while troubleshooting a specific problem.

The system only captures debug-level messages in memory when you enable debug logging through a configuration change, and purges them in accordance with the configuration’s persistence setting.

## Getting Log Types

- **info**: The informative log level.
- **default**: The default log level.
- **error**: The error log level.
- **fault**: The fault log level.
title: debug
